title: JoyMarsha
author: JoyMarsha
content: Your entry into the world of crypto is the simplest and clearest evidence that your future is secured in one way or the other. you owe your life everything, to invest in the right projects. Everything you met in the world of crypto that made your passage possible was done, placed there, and created by Satoshi who wants everyone to be financially free. You came into crypto as a novice and became clothed with the knowledge of it that you didn't pay for. The information is shared here by different crypto enthusiasts. A simple reflection on this should help you banish any sense of entitlement in life and from the world. You won't exit it with anything you never came with.So, you should go through life with gratitude for knowing crypto

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: If you are going to include Satoshi in your ode, then you should use bitcoin, not cryptocurrency.Quote from: JoyMarsha on September 07, 2022, 03:06:36 PMYour entry into the world of crypto is the simplest and clearest evidence that your future is secured in one way or the other.Your future is not secured by bitcoin, but by the actions you take and skills you learn. Bitcoin is just an asset.- Jay -

comments.author: LeGaulois
comments.body: I laughed so hard reading his post. There are truly a lot of shits on this forum, especially on this board. Between the teenagers who never worked once in their life, the others who seem drunk, the ones who never paid income taxes but complain...If your future is so secure, why don't you quit your job? I know the answer, it's because you're not brave enough to do it... since you're not sure.I don't owe anything to anyone. I don't rely on someone to have food on my table and secondly, time is money, nothing is free.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Well just being involved in crypto-Crypto doesn't guarantee you complete safety. Take for example the people involved in the recent trust wallet hack. This is what newbie fail to understand. Even when in Crypto you still have your own part to play in terms of safety like.# keeping your funds privately in your wallet# not giving in to greed# using exchange for purchases alone# believe less in telegram, you tube or social media without doing your verification.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: JoyMarsha on September 07, 2022, 03:06:36 PMYour entry into the world of crypto is the simplest and clearest evidence that your future is secured in one way or the other. I ask how is this done that it is that easy and everyone here is not yet made. Come of it and be useful to yourself. Cryptocurrency can only give you the opportunity to create wealth if you take the right investment chances and not investing in shit projects that you never get to make any profit until the coin is delisted from an exchange   Coins can be delisted especially shit projects and you lose all your investment. Also you can invest in certain project yet you don't benefit from it . Be wise and don't only think of crypto as secured.

comments.author: Marvell1
comments.body: Cryptocurrencies themselves have never been regarded as a safe market, so how can it be demonstrated that it will be able to guarantee our safety if we invest in this market? I know bitcoin and cryptocurrencies are creating space for all of us here, money making opportunities, opportunities to get rich, things the outside can't give us but don't exaggerate it too much. Not participating here can also become millionaire, remember that only a few. Cryptocurrencies create opportunities for us and it's up to us whether we adopt or not, many people who don't need crypto can still be successful.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: JoyMarsha on September 07, 2022, 03:06:36 PMYour entry into the world of crypto is the simplest and clearest evidence that your future is secured in one way or the other.This is quite a big word without any guarantee mate. Yes entering into crypto could have a chance of getting rich but that isnt sure hence a lot loss huge money if you would compare others case.Quote from: JoyMarsha on September 07, 2022, 03:06:36 PMSo, you should go through life with gratitude for knowing cryptoI'll be thankful knowing crypto but that isnt due to the fact I knew crypto but the things Ive learned with crypto. Its quite a different things. If you just enter here without such audacity to learn then it could end up differently.

comments.author: xzy887
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on September 08, 2022, 04:02:39 AM it be demonstrated that it will be able to guarantee our safety if we invest in this market? I agree with your words. But there is nothing you can do if you fall into the fraud circle yourself. In fact, you may know that no third party has a hand in this crypto currency. So if the person you deal with here is trusted then you will never get cheated. But these crypto currencies can be scams, especially if you are investing somewhere you should be aware of them.Because this cryptocurrency has not yet been validated by all countries. So there is nothing you can do if you get scammed by investing there. And no one can pay the security of that invested money. And no one will take responsibility for it. In a word, there is no security in invested money. So invest carefully before investing. You will get your security in that

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: OP, firstly, remove the word "should". I am always indignant when they tell me that I owe something to someone. But to the topic: OP, I don't think my future is secure if I use cryptocurrency in any way. But I am sincerely happy for you that when you get here and learn about "crypto", you boldly declare that you will be provided. Honestly, I sincerely wish you all the very best.Another moment. Some knowledge is not necessarily paid for; over time you will understand this. If you have a burning desire to learn something, you do not need to pay. You can study on your own.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Quote from: JoyMarsha on September 07, 2022, 03:06:36 PMEverything you met in the world of crypto that made your passage possible was done, placed there, and created by Satoshi who wants everyone to be financially free. Satoshi created only bitcoin, many different other individuals created the thousands of shitcoins you find in the market today. Because bitcoin gives you financial freedom, don't think shitcoins give that offer too.QuoteA simple reflection on this should help you banish any sense of entitlement in life and from the world. You won't exit it with anything you never came with.I feel many people know of this fact, but not because of or through cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Maus0728 on September 08, 2022, 12:18:01 PMThat narrative doesn't, in my opinion, apply to the general. You certainly can't say that to someone who lost all of their money trading bitcoin or any other shitcoin, or to someone who took a loan to purchase bitcoin at its peak before subsequently selling it at a significant loss.Sure some of them are thankful, but also some of them hates for what crypto does to them.The truth is that everyone has his own side of the story, some get in on a smooth ground while others learnt their lesson the hard ways, but we should never forget that life still continue but the worst that could ever happen to someone in crypto is when the same mistakes repeated itself over such user the second time, and there's nothing to use in avoiding making mistakes in cryptocurrency than when you sit down all by yourself and begin to learn and make discoveries.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: JoyMarsha on September 07, 2022, 03:06:36 PM~If crypto would make you "secured", everyone could have just went to crypto and call it there. It is the same thing to those stock traders that had invested in the "right thing". You could be rich, but that does not make someone "secured" fully. They could went through a lot of debts that they need to repay and would make them broke after all the repayments.By the way like lovemayfamilis, maybe remove the word "should". I am thankful for knowing crypto especially Bitcoin, but I should not be "so obligated" to do so. It is like being obliged to be thankful to the inventors of internet for letting you browse the internet.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: JoyMarsha on September 07, 2022, 03:06:36 PMYour entry into the world of crypto is the simplest and clearest evidence that your future is secured in one way or the other. Like I believe some users have already pointed out, your being in crypto (like you put it) is not a guarantee that your future is secured, what determines your future is the decisions you make today, and trust me, many crypto users today are still making the wrong decisions by investing in the wrong assets, even those that are investing in the right assets can be doing it in the wrong time.And from my personal opinion, two ways one can have some level of success in life is -1- Always making the right decision and executing it at the right time2- Always being at the right place, doing the right thing, at the right time.Being in crypto does not guarantee any good future for anyone, the decisions we make while here is what does, there are many that are not in this space yet, but they have a more guaranteed future than those that are in crypto, because of the decisions they've made and all they've been able to achieve.

comments.author: ShowOff
comments.body: Quote from: JoyMarsha on September 07, 2022, 03:06:36 PMSo, you should go through life with gratitude for knowing cryptoNot only crypto, I think we should always be grateful for being given time to live and enjoy all its benefits. Crypto has been one of the reasons why I've been on this forum since 2015, obviously it would be pretty hypocritical when I don't want to be grateful after getting to know him. Crypto has improved the economic conditions of many people, the more we know about it, the more chance we have to benefit from it.OP, don't forget that you should also thank the inventor, he is a satoshi. His intelligence has brought us together in this forum to discuss many things about his findings.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: The most common sentiment seems to be gratitude for Satoshi, who created the Bitcoin community and its enabling technology. After all, in accepting Bitcoin, we give thanks for all those who came before us and made this possible. But above all, you have to stay true to yourself and don't get swept up in the hype of speculation and misinformation that surrounds Bitcoin, or any other cryptocurrency for that matter. Listen to what experts have to say about these incredible new technologies, but make sure to process the information through a rational lens.

comments.author: Russlenat
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on September 08, 2022, 04:02:39 AMCryptocurrencies themselves have never been regarded as a safe market, so how can it be demonstrated that it will be able to guarantee our safety if we invest in this market? I know bitcoin and cryptocurrencies are creating space for all of us here, money making opportunities, opportunities to get rich, things the outside can't give us but don't exaggerate it too much. Not participating here can also become millionaire, remember that only a few. Cryptocurrencies create opportunities for us and it's up to us whether we adopt or not, many people who don't need crypto can still be successful. Crypto definitely changed some lives, but only for those who take the risk and overcome the fears and struggles. However, for some, who take another business aside from crypto, they also made successful remarks and become hugely profitable. So probably, it’s not about crypto or other businesses that make people rich and become widely successful, but it’s more on the attitude of a single person towards business and being knowledgeable and skillful in everything he does.

comments.author: Viscore
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on September 08, 2022, 04:02:39 AMCryptocurrencies themselves have never been regarded as a safe market, so how can it be demonstrated that it will be able to guarantee our safety if we invest in this market? I know bitcoin and cryptocurrencies are creating space for all of us here, money making opportunities, opportunities to get rich, things the outside can't give us but don't exaggerate it too much. Not participating here can also become millionaire, remember that only a few. Cryptocurrencies create opportunities for us and it's up to us whether we adopt or not, many people who don't need crypto can still be successful. Crypto has a lot of risks more than we can imagine simply because of its unpredictable market movement. The reason why some people never make it until the end and reach the heights of success because they quit along the way and lose their money. Most likely, those people who never stopped believing and hold on to their crypto dreams have survived and succeeded. Obviously, it’s not just crypto but definitely in all businesses. There are no safe investments as they have their own set of risks, but it’s up to the people how they can lessen and manage the risks, and still become successful in the end.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on September 08, 2022, 06:34:16 PMAnd from my personal opinion, two ways one can have some level of success in life is -1- Always making the right decision and executing it at the right time2- Always being at the right place, doing the right thing, at the right time.....and the hidden third way would be luck, since that is one factor that no one seems to admit at the end. Even if you made the right decision, luck would still determine how "right" your decision was. Kinda sucks, but that's the harsh reality.I could have been successfully rich if I was lucky in getting my first Bitcoin back in 2013, but I was unlucky for many various reason.Not sure if there was a popular successful stories I have not read in crypto yet, but surely there would be some people.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Quote from: LeGaulois on September 07, 2022, 03:28:24 PMI laughed so hard reading his post. There are truly a lot of shits on this forum, especially on this board. Between the teenagers who never worked once in their life, the others who seem drunk, the ones who never paid income taxes but complain...Honestly, I had a laugh too. I was wondering what inspired Op to create such a fulfilled thread. He was so positive that everyone in this space is escaped from the shackles of poverty by Satoshi, including himself. Well, I cannot judge, you never can tell if he got some bitcoin as far back as 2011 and is able to hold till now.Meanwhile, a part of Op's statement truly got me and I am grateful to bitcointalk and it's members for that, see the statement below;Quote from: JoyMarsha on September 07, 2022, 03:06:36 PMYou came into crypto as a novice and became clothed with the knowledge of it that you didn't pay for. This forum is so generous with information and always willing to help, I can say that that is the Satoshi spirit.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Bitcoin has been a shining light in my life, a real saviour. I have so many opportunities that would not have been possible in my life if I didn’t discover bitcoin so early. I thank Satoshi for everything he did, his genius & innovation. I also thank the guy who told me about bitcoin.I try my best to educate others so they can also gain a better life.
